process.title: How We Work
process.description: Every engagement begins with deep listening—understanding the question in the foreground, heartfelt musings and ponderings, your history and context. We align on an engagement design to start, knowing we'll often discover even better questions and goals as we go.Whether we're working on personal advisory, leadership team strategy, or organizational transformation, it's as much discovery and insight mining as anything else. The work reveals itself as we unlock what's already there.

accessibility.content: I believe good counsel should be available to those doing important work. That's why I reserve space each quarter for scholarship engagements. Get in touch.

my_story.title: My Story
paragraphs: I've spent my career helping organizations navigate periods of significant change. As the founder of Light Work, I bring a unique combination of strategic vision and intuitive understanding to help leaders see the unseen dynamics within their organizations.
My background spans operational leadership, strategic advising, and organizational design, all informed by my ongoing creative practice and interest in how systems evolve and adapt.
I believe the most valuable insights often emerge from the spaces between conventional metrics—the human dynamics, cultural nuances, and unspoken patterns that shape how organizations function.

how_i_work.title: How I Work
how_i_work.content: I serve as a trusted advisor and intuitive guide rather than a traditional coach or consultant. My engagements are designed to be high-impact, focused, and tailored to your specific context. I limit my client roster to ensure deep engagement and availability for each partnership.

come_cloudy.title: Come cloudy.
come_cloudy.description: Before things are ready to bloom, they get stormy—that's where ideas gestate, where something new is forming. Some of my favorite collaborators are talented, ambitious leaders in foggy conditions who could use a mirror, divining rod, or compass tune-up—the perfect foundation for your next solid step forward. Together, we illuminate the unseen. We discover patterns you can't see from inside, surface what's implicit, translate murky vision into clarity.

about_preview.name: Haley Hoffman
about_preview.bio: I've spent 15+ years helping people and organizations navigate significant change. My background spans product strategy (TED.com 2.0 redesign), management consulting (Incandescent, including White House facilitation), and strategic advisory with founders, leaders, and enterprises. I work at the intersection of intuition and analysis. My ongoing creative practice informs how I approach strategic challenges—I help you see familiar problems from new angles and identify solutions that emerge from understanding rather than forcing.
